Capital Quiz

This app can be used to manage your potential job leads. Each job lead includes the company name, telephone number, its website URL, and your brief comments about the company. Open the nav drawer to view the navigation menu. You will be able to invoke the app\'s functions. You will be able to access the following screens:

Start Quiz
Here, you will be able to begin a new quiz! Each quiz consists of 6 questions, and each question ahs 3 possible answers. Your job is to match the country to its capital.

Quiz History
Here, you will be able to review all of your past quizzes. They are sorted from newest to oldest.

Close app
The app will be closed.

Get help
Useful help information about the app will be displayed.
